mean_cn: v. 扫描，浏览，审视，细看；  n. 扫描，浏览，细看
mean_en: to get an image of an object, a part of somebody’s body, etc. on a computer by passing X-rays, ultrasound waves or electromagnetic waves over it in a special machine
short_phrase: a body scan in the hospital
sentence: Scan the code to get further information.
sentence_trans: 获取更多信息，请扫二维码。
